title: the Sun Carver
intro: Kharra-Ryn, a determined young blacksmith, carries a pair of golden & molten hammers and is orbited by three glowing solar cores. She embodies the spirit of a living forge, capable of crafting the best Soulforges in the world.

abilities.name: Living Forge
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn carries the heart of a forge within her, allowing her to aid her allies' progression by contributing her own gold to their item purchases. Once every few minutes, Kharra-Ryn can select an allied hero and choose an item they are currently building. She can then spend a portion of her own gold to contribute to that item's cost.

Her gold contribution is added a small bonus when contributed to the ally's item completion progress, effectively giving her a personal reduced cost on the upgrade.

abilities.name: Core Breach
abilities.details: Kharra-Ryn smashes one of her solar cores with a hammer, launching it in a line. The core deals physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit, slightly knocking back the target and reducing their physical power for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Molten Impact
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn imbues her hammers, causing her next three basic attacks within a few seconds to deal bonus magical damage (scaling with health) and apply a stack of Molten Impact to the target.

Upon reaching three Molten Impact stacks, the target is dealt magical damage (scaling with the target's health) and gets stunned for a short duration. The stacks are then removed and can be replied again after a short cooldowns per target.

abilities.name: Foundry Force
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn slams both of her hammers down simultaneously, creating a powerful shockwave around her, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and briefly slowing all enemies hit.

When Foundry Force hits an enemy who has at least one Molten Impact stack, it will immediately maximise the stacks to trigger the stun effect.

abilities.name: Solar Cores
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn send all of her Solar Cores to orbit around an ally hero.

Each of the cores can completely block 1 ability from the enemy heroes. Once 3 blocks are completed, the solar cores will return to Kharra-Ryn.

While the Solar Cores are away, Kharra-Ryn will have her own stats reduced, and will not be able to use her Core Breach ability until the solar cores return to her.
